1.0.0.name: wordpress/buzzz-et
1.0.0.description:
What this plugin does:

Automatically displays a "Yahoo! Buzz" button for each post and page.

Note: This plugin is soon to be discontinued.

  • Check out our new social media button plugin: S-ButtonZ (Social Media Buttons Plugin)

Features:

  • Full admin options for buzz buttons.

  • Choose to display buzz button at top left or right or bottom left or right.

  • Can hide buttons on home page, pages, posts, tag pages, archives and search results page.

  • Hide buttons on a single page or post See Faq.
